bookTitle: The Gulag Archipelago, 1918-1956: An Experiment in Literary Investigation, Books I-II
bookAuthors: Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn, Thomas P. Whitney, Georgi Plekhanov, Leon Trotsky
Plot: Volume 1 of the gripping epic masterpiece, Solzhenitsyn's chilling report of his arrest and interrogation, which exposed to the world the vast bureaucracy of secret police that haunted Soviet society
Characters: Joseph Stalin, Mikhail Ryumin, Viktor Abakumov
